segments.text: Oh , Mr Green , my name is Jianshan . You don't know me , but I'm a friend of David Smith .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When I told David I was coming here to live , he give me your number , and suggest that I give your a ring . I was wondering if you could give me some advices .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll be please to if I can . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm looking for a place to live . David thought as you are a @ agent . you might know something is suitable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I think I can help you . Why not you come around and see me ? Do you know my office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , well , that's just a few minutes walk to my office , come around and see me now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much , Mr Green .
segments.speaker: S2
